name: Not Faster Than Light
description:
Not Faster Than Light is a game made for Ludum Dare 45 in 48 hours by Triple TTT Games. It is a 2D side-scrolling space resource managment game.

Your goal is simple: reach the destination station with as much cargo as possible in the least time possible! However, you don't have any fuel, and thus you must burn your cargo to keep moving. Cargo is not an appropriate fuel, so your engine's pipe gets clogged — that's why you need cleaning gel.

Manage your gel and cargo reserves to make it to the final station — and don't forget to avoid meteors, which keep crushing into your ship!
